pullrequest.title: Components Part 2: Move header files to component folders

content.raw:
Ultimately we want each of these `Types.hh` headers to be in component-specific subdirectories, so they don't conflict with the more general `Types.hh` or with each other. Ultimately, what a user will see is the following files:

```
ignition/common/Types.hh
ignition/common/graphics/Types.hh
ignition/common/events/Types.hh
ignition/common/Utils.hh
ignition/common/av/Utils.hh
```

If we weren't putting the component-specific headers into component-specific subdirectories within the include directory structure, then we would get clashes between the file names, and the headers would not get installed correctly.
